description: Primary Composio MCP integration hub - 20 tools across 3 toolkits

tools.name: Get Compliance
tools.description: Retrieve compliance data for sites, categories, or questions

tools.name: Get Items (BETA)
tools.description: Retrieve items from 21risk OData API with filtering

tools.name: Get Items Per Month
tools.description: Fact table data for items per month, one row per question per site per month

tools.name: Get Organizations
tools.description: Retrieve organizations with OData filtering and pagination

tools.name: Get Properties
tools.description: Fetch properties related to sites including COPE information

tools.name: Get Reports
tools.description: Retrieve audit reports including draft, published, and scheduled reports

tools.name: Get RiskModel Categories
tools.description: Retrieve risk model categories for grouping questions and compliance checks

tools.name: Get Risk Models
tools.description: Retrieve risk models used for audits and compliance

tools.name: Get Sites
tools.description: Retrieve sites (locations) from 21risk OData API

tools.name: Create Contact
tools.description: Create a new contact in 2chat account after gathering and verifying data

tools.name: Get API Usage Info
tools.description: Retrieve current API usage and account information

tools.name: List Contacts
tools.description: List all contacts in 2chat account

tools.name: List Webhook Subscriptions
tools.description: List all configured webhook subscriptions for audit/management

tools.name: Test API Key
tools.description: Validate API key and retrieve account info for authentication confirmation

tools.name: Query Batch Presence
tools.description: Query presence states of multiple channels in a single API call

tools.name: Query Batch Presence History
tools.description: Query presence history for multiple channels in single API call

tools.name: Create Ably Channel
tools.description: Create new channel or retrieve existing channel in Ably

tools.name: Delete Channel Subscription
tools.description: Unsubscribe devices/clients from push notifications for specific channel

tools.name: Get Channel Details
tools.description: Retrieve metadata and details for specific Ably channel

tools.name: Get Channel History
tools.description: Retrieve message history for specified Ably channel

description: Builder.io visual development platform integration for UI/UX generation
